why-us.title: Why become part of our family?
why-us.text: We deliver professional renders of Virtual Staging, 3D Modeling, Virtual Renovation and many other services.

bloc1.title: FAST DELIVERY
bloc1.text: We deliver within 24 hours and in 48 hours for more than 20 photos

bloc2.title: NO SUBSCRIPTION
bloc2.text: Only pay per image rate.You don't need to pay for subscription

bloc3.title: UNLIMITED REVIEWS
bloc3.text: Our goal is your satisfaction. We allow our clients to have unlimited changes

bloc4.title: FREE SOCIALMEDIA VIDEO
bloc4.text: After ordering, you will get a promotional video for your listing. FOR FREE!

what-we-offer.title: Benefits of Virtual Staging
what-we-offer.text: Don't underestimate the power of Virtual Staging! This is the effect of our Virtual Staging on our clients listings

bloc1.text: Virtually Staged units have 85% more chance to be sold faster!

bloc2.text: After Virtually Staging your listing, you can increase the unit's price till 40%!

bloc3.text: 70% of the virtually staged listings, were sold in just 2 weeks in the market!

our-services.title: OUR SERVICES

bloc1.title: VIRTUAL STAGING
bloc1.text: How many new visits do you want for your listing? Virtual Staging will increase your selling time by 85%

bloc2.title: VIRTUAL RENOVATION
bloc2.text: Do you want to change your floors, cielings or fix any damage? Try Virtual Renovation now and give your listing a new soul

bloc3.title: 3D MODELING
bloc3.text: Why waiting for the listing to be built? Create your perfect vision of your 2D plan and sell it now!

our-services.text: Do you have other plans for your listing?

contact-us.text: We are pleased to hear from you. How can we help?

bloc4.text: Enhance your image colors by making the skies more vivid and the grass more alive

bloc5.title: Item removal
bloc5.text: Declutter or remove all the unwanted items and objects in your photo

bloc6.title: CUSTOMIZED EDITING
bloc6.text: Change your paint color, add an art frame to the livingroom or add an SUV in your garage

bloc7.title: lISTING PROMOTIONAL VIDEO
bloc7.text: Do you want to share your listing on your social media accounts in video format? We do the coolest promotional videos. Check it out now!

place-order-page.title: Place your order
place-order-page.text: Here we need you to provide us some informations. The more infos we get from you, the more we will be able to satisfy you
place-order-page.subtitle: Select a product

card1.title: virtual staging
card1.subtitle: Make your property shine with our virtual staging service! Get picture-perfect results on

card2.title: virtual renovation
card2.subtitle: Transform your space without lifting a hammer! Try our virtual renovation service today.

card3.title: 3d modeling (interior)
card3.subtitle: Experience your dream home before it's built! Try our 3D modeling to visualize your space like never before.

card4.title: 3d modeling (exterior)
card4.subtitle: Bring your project to life from the outside in! Try our Facade modeling and see your vision come to life.

card5.title: item removal
card5.subtitle: Remove any unwanted items from your photos. It's for FREE if you will virtually stage them after!

card6.title: image enhancement
card6.subtitle: Make your memories shine! Try our image enhancement and bring your photos to the next level.

card7.title: 2D color plan
card7.subtitle: See your space in living color! Try our 2D color plan service and visualize your design in a whole new way.

card8.title: 3D plan
card8.subtitle: Experience your design in full color and depth! Try our 3D color plan service and bring your space to life.
